responses.rationale: The segment reports a factual event (positive test) and does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
Describes actions taken ('flock... was killed and was being composted') as a safeguard ('to guard against spread') without active reassurance.
Describes a planned action ('department will test other flocks') as a preparedness measure without active reassurance.
The segment reports factual statistics about past findings and does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
